multiplication_method_hasher module

Adds the remainder of a modulus multiplied by the size of the hash table to a 64 bit hash, for each byte in the input.

class multiplication_method_hasher.MultiplicationHasher[source]

Bases: Hasher

For each byte k in the input add h(k) toa a 64-bit hash. h(k) is computed as follows: h(k) = floor (M (kA mod 1))

hash(raw_bytes: bytes) → Hash[source]

Calculates the hash by a concrete method for each byte and adding it to an N-bit hash.

Args:

raw_bytes (bytes): Array of bytes of the input.

Returns:

The hash of the input bytes.
